name: 3DFPS Final Project
description:
For this project I decided to change the aesthetic of the game and add a story to it.

Modifications:

-Made my own models in blender

  • House
  • Stairs
  • Arch
  • Long Grass
  • Trees
  • Flowers
  • Lake
  • Terrain

-I changed the lighting for each level. 

-I changed the main menu colors.

-I changed the key color and the gun. 

-Added a variety of pickups.

-I changed the difficulty in each level. Let the queen double shoot.

-Added a terrain with mountains under the original terrain so the player doesn't fall off the cliff.

-Changed the music pitch. 

Credits:

Sophia Grady
